cause.description:
Paws for a Cause is the largest campaign in support of animals in BC!
Join us on September 14, 2008 to help raise $750,000 for animals in need. Register today!
Last year 10,000 campaigners in 37 communities across the province raised $680,000. This year we're trying to do even better, but we need your help!
It starts on June 1 and it peaks on September 14 when 37 communities across the province Walk for the Animals.
Funds raised through Paws for a Cause stay in local communities to help animals in need.
Become a crusader for Paws for a Cause – join now!
http://www.spca.bc.ca/walk/
1. Provide emergency rescue and treatment for thousands of injured animals
2. Reduce the tragedy of pet overpopulation through low-cost spay/neuter programs across BC
3. Advocate for stronger anti-cruelty laws to protect animals from abuse and neglect
cause.mission: To provide urgently needed care for thousands of animals each year.
